hello.narrator: {i}A girl with a checkered pattern bursts angrily into the palace.{n}Looks like she forced her way in.{s}

who.name: Who are you ?
who.text: Yuuka Kazami, Flower Master of the Four Seasons.{n}Well, at least it was my title before some weird god stole it.

how.name: What are you doing in the underground ?
how.text: Since yesterday I can't go to my fields without... consequences.{n}I heard that hell's thermal sources have medicinal properties.{n}So I came to check if the rumor was true.

what.name: But why are you checking the palace of all places ?
what.text: No reason really. I just wanted to check out this nice mansion{n}You really should hire a bodyguard.

ill.name: Are you actually ill ?
ill.text: Well, last year I planted some new flowers.{n}They've started blooming recently.

ask.name: Did you eat one of your flowers ?
ask.text: Are you serious ?{n}I am actually vegetarian.{n}I find this offensive.{n}

ask.name: What is it that you planted ?
ask.text: Some seeds my friend Medicine gave me.{n}I guess this was a bad idea actually, her plants make me numb.

ask.name: Ask her to visit her place
ask.text: Sure thing.{n}I can bring you there once I am healed.

check.name: Check her up her skin
check.narrator: {i}You notice her eyes and nose are red.{n}She seems to be embarrassed.{s}

mindread.name: Read her mind
mindread.narrator: {i}You're going to have pretty nightmares because of this...{s}

smell.name: Smell the pollen
smell.narrator: {i}You were so excited to meet someone new the poison only calms you down.{n}You can now think more clearly.{s}

water.name: Give her something to drink
water.narrator: {i}This actually doesn't seem to improve her situation at all.{n}Green leaves begin to sprout out of her body, eventually strangling her...{s}

punch.name: Attack the intruder
punch.text: {i}She takes it as a greeting, and greets you back.{n}Sadly for you, her punch packs quite a bit more than yours{s}

medicine.name: Give her something against allergies.
medicine.narrator: {i}Maybe you should have used it for Satori ?{n}It seems to work against the symptoms, but she still feels uneasy.{s}

medicine.name: Give her some more Medicine.
medicine.narrator: {i}You hand her a doll Youkai.{n}She begins to sneeze danmaku at you...{s}

rose.name: Change her DNA to make her resistant to pollen.
rose.text: Wow, thank you !{n}Now I guess I can really master all kinds of flowers
